import React from 'react' import Nav from '../Nav' import './ProfileScreen.css' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { selectUser } from '../features/userSlice' import { signOut } from 'firebase/auth' import { auth } from '../firebase'; function ProfileScreen () { const user = useSelector(selectUser) return (

Edit Profile

{user.email}

Plans

Renewal date: 29/09/2021

Netflix standard 1080p

Netflix basic 480p

Netflix Premium 4k+HDR

) } export default ProfileScreen
